<title level="1" pfs="">[Skin Beetle Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2462)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

When a massive creature such a [dinosaur](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=32) or [giant](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=53) dies in skin beetle territory, the industrious vermin swarm together.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/SkinBeetleSwarm.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Skin Beetle Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2462)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 89</row>

**Perception** +16; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 125

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 8, slashing 8

**Weaknesses**
area damage 8, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, burrow 15 feet, fly 15 feet

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 5d6 piercing damage (DC 23 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails the saving throw also takes 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and is [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) as long as it's taking bleed damage.

</column>
